name: Glasses
description: Elderly client, on financial assistance, uses most of her money for food, transportation back and from hospital due to frequent medical check ups and her diapers. Unable to save funds to pay for a new pair of glasses. Looking for a donor who would be able to help fund this, so she may see more clearly, adding more clarity to her life.

name: Lifree Diapers (XL)
description:
Client struggling with medical issues that cause her to dependent on diapers. Due to lack of funds, she is unable to get the correct quantity of diapers - hence limiting her mobility.
She lives with her husband, who also has medical issues and cannot work, living in a rental unit with financial assistance. Looking for donations of XL size Lifree Pull up diapers to assist family.

name: Diapers (Lifree)
description: Recently divorced elderly, 70 years old, requires assistance with getting diapers as she is unable to afford them on her own. Due to her recent change in marital status, she is no longer supported by her children or ex-husband, leaving her with rental and bill arrears. Hoping to find a donor who would be able to sponsor some adult diapers so she may alleviate costs for her medical needs. She prefers Lifree brand as it does not cause discomfort to her.

name: Blood glucose meter
description: Client is married but lives separately from her husband and 2 stepsons. Client has a biological daughter living with her aged 16. Currently, client has her parents staying with her as her father had a recent heart attack and bypass surgery, requires caregiving. Father was also recently diagnosed with diabetes. Hence she is looking for a blood sugar meter to help monitor. I would be helpful for them to received one. Thank you!

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Services @ Taman Jurong SSO
contact.name: Charmaine Lim

name: ART kit
description:
For clients from low-income family with children of age 5 -21 years old. With more testing needed during the current phase, low-income families would have difficulties affording more test kits, especially families with many children or families with young and old.

Donor could send the test kit to SHINE Children & Youth Services (Clementi):
329 Clementi Ave 2, 
#01-248, 
Singapore 120329

contact.org: SHINE Children and Youth Services - Clementi
contact.name: Gwen Ho

name: Mobility Scooter
description:
Client is not mobile due to the multiple health conditions, including a tumour in her knee. Being a mother of young children, it has been challenging for her to manage the household by herself. Her husband helps out at home but recently, he was diagnosed with arthritis and this had also affected his mobility. Due to the couple’s poor health, they have not been able to run errands and they are also not able to send their 4-year-old to school. There are concerns that the child’s development may be affected if she continues to not have the opportunity to attend school. There are no breadwinners in the family due to their health issues. They are heavily dependent on the financial assistance from the Social Service Office to make ends meet. 

Mobility scooter (preferably for two passenger so that client’s husband can send their child to school)

name: Wheelchair Big Size
description: Elderly woman (73 years old) staying alone in Spooner Road, she needs a big size wheelchair for her to move about doing her daily chores.

name: Child Wheelchair
description:
Family consists of single mother and 5 young children living in a rental flat. Client's 7-year-old daughter had an accident several days ago resulting in bruising and 2nd-degree burns on her leg. The child is required to attend frequent follow-ups at the hospital in the next month and is unable to walk or put pressure on the injured leg. As the family has no mobility aids, the child currently moves by hopping on one leg, putting herself at risk of another injury. 

The family would benefit from the provision of a children's wheelchair to improve mobility, safety, and well-being of the child throughout her recovery. Thank you for supporting the family.
specifications: Wheelchair must be able to accommodate child's weight of 19kg

name: Rollator
description: 70years old lady has limited mobility, she has to use wheelchair for long distances, she wants to have a rollator to practice walking so that she is able to walk more stably and be able to sit when she needs to rest.

name: Wheelchair
description: 65 years old Chinese female married and staying with her husband and daughter. Client is mostly homebound and is alone at home during the day, she experiences breathlessness whenever she ambulates in the Community. A wheelchair will help her to move around in the community.

name: wheelchair
description: Client and husband are both low-income earners, with 4 children, all aged below 16 years old. Their eldest son had recently injured himself, and recovery period is expected to be at least 6 months. The family had been encouraged to get a wheelchair to help with his mobility, but the family is unable to afford it. They are thus hoping to get a wheelchair to ease their son's recovery.(Kamie)
specifications: Able to withstand more than 105 kg

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bedok North
contact.name: Teddy Fu

name: Motorised Scooter
description:
Client is a cancer patient and staying alone. Client has some mobility issues. Thus, having a motorised scooter will allow client to go about his daily activities.

Note: Client can only use a motorised scooter that is able to support 100-150kg   in weight.

name: Elderly Toilet Side Bar Fixtures
description:
Female / 68 years old currently undergoing occupational therapy requires side bar fixtures for toilet. 

Fixtures such as:
1) Flip up Steel Grab Bar
2) FT Chrome Bathroom Grab Bar
3) Flip Up Shower Seat
4) Anti Slip Mats

Thank you! :)

name: Motorised Scooter
description: Patient (57/F) has difficulties walking due to frequent giddiness after dialysis and shortness of breath due to her health conditions. She has difficulty traveling on her own and hence she would usually not be able to go out much unless someone accompanies her. Hence having a motorised scooter will increase her ease of access in the community and allow her to travel safely and independently.

name: Milk Powder
description: Family of 4 with children aged 5 and 2, the older diagnosed with Autism Spectrum Disorder. Father is the sole breadwinner of the family as mother has to take care of the children because the older child was kicked out of preschool. Father has an existing leg injury due to an accident that affects his attendance at work, resulting in lack of income for the family. The family is requesting for Nestle Lactogrow Step 3 and Step 4 milk powder for the children.
specifications: Nestle Lactogrow Step 3 & Step 4 Milk Powder

name: S26 Stage 3 (3 tins)
description: Low income family with two very young children needs help for the milk powder during this period of time. Father has just managed to get a job to make ends meet. Mother is also trying to find a job. Please respond if you are keen to donate. Thank you.

name: Diapers
description: Client, 39, is staying with her two children, 15 and 2 in an open market rental after her husband requested for them to leave the matrimonial flat. Client is unemployed at this moment. She requires diapers for her daughter but is not able to afford it. Please contact Social Worker Dorcas (63260300) for any clarifications. Thank you!

name: Safety gate for baby
description: A single mother with a 1 year old son. Family requires a safety gate for baby as her son is at the stage of learning to crawl and walk. Hence to ensure her son's safety, she hopes to have a safety gate in her house.

name: Merries Diapers Pants Size L
description:
A low income family is requesting for baby diapers specifically Merries brand for their toddler who is experiencing severe eczema.  
Wife is currently heavily pregnant and is due in Nov 2021. Husband is the sole breadwinner of the family and is a low income earner. The couple currently lives with their 1 yr old daughter, who has medical conditions involving her skin condition and requires special care. Their daughter has been in an out of hospital/clinics due to the skin condition and this strains the family's expensss further. Client plans to seek employment after her confinement ends to support the family. She used to work multiple jobs but currently is unemployed due to her pregnancy and caregiving issues for her toddler. With husband’s meagre income, they are unable to afford some of the basic necessities for their kids. The family is living in a 2 room rental unit. Hoping for kind donations for Merries Diapers Pants Size L (for 3 months worth).

name: Similac Stage 3
description: A young mother of 3 young children requires Similac Stage 3 for her 2 older daughters. She has recently given birth and is currently recovering. Her husband is medically certified unfit for employment. The family is currently dependent on financial assistance. Donations of Similac Stage 3 will be appreciated. Family needs at least 4 tins of 800g of similac stage 3 per month.

name: Milk, Cereal, Diapers (For 6months)
description:
Mother is suffering from chronic health and has a young child aged 2yo. Father is the sole breadwinner and earns low wages.
Family will require practical milk and diapers help for the child for next 6 months. Child has respiratory problem hence requires 2 different milk.
Usage per month: 3 packs of diapers, 3 tins each for 2 different milk, 3 tins of cereal. Please contact me for the specific brands required (Appreciate donor to cover delivery and send to client house). Thank you.

name: Huggies Platinum Pull Up Pants Size M
description: Family has a young son and a newborn son and elderly to take care of. The sole breadwinner of the family is unable to work as he met with an accident which has impacted his ability to walk. They require assistance with milk powder and diapers for their newborn son. The doctor has also recommended the specific milk powder for her baby as she has a medical condition. Family are having difficulties coping with the expenses of these items.

But family has financial problems and cannot buy a new one. A stroller is urgently needed so that client is able to bring the twins along if she needs to run errands on her own during the day.

name: Milk Powder
description: Client is the sole-breadwinner of his family. Together with his Vietnamese wife and his 2 young children, aged 26 months (coming to 2 years old) and 11 months-old baby, the family lives in a one-room rental flat in Marine Terrace. Client is hoping for some donations of milk supplies to lighten his financial burden. Due to his unstable income since the start of Covid-19 pandemic, family has been struggling financially. Client hopes to request for: 1) a few tins of Nestle NAN Optipro H.A. Growing Up Milk Stage 3 2) a few tins of Nestle Nan Optipro Infant Milk Formula Stage 2. Do contact/WhatsApp me at 98598768 for further liaison on delivery address etc. Thank you.

Unfortunately, the family's old laptop has malfunction and they cannot afford a new set. Require a laptop/tablet with Microsoft office & zoom (with camera) function please. name: Tablets with 4G function
description: Our research unit are in need of 4 numbers of tablets to use for upcoming data collection with family participants. Tablets can come with 4G function and able to access Wifi/mobile data to connect to the internet. No specific brand and second hand is welcomed as long as the tablet is decently usable (not extremely laggy) and can be used to access the internet via wifi/data. Preferably a screen size of 8-inch and above. Unfortunately tablets will be needed as a laptop would not be ideal as it is not portable or touch-screen. The items will be sent to the centre and please contact us for delivery details (email: dik@childrensociety.org.sg, contact: 9436 7401). Thank you for your kind and generous support.

name: Laptop
description: Client's son is having his PSLE examinations this year. Son would benefit from having his own laptop as he is sharing with his sibling currently during their HBL. He would benefit from having his own laptop so that he can utilise it for his own learning and preparation for his PSLE examinations. For further liaisons on delivery etc, do contact me at 98598768, thank you.

name: Laptop
description:
This is a household of 6 family members. The sole-income earner takes on a low pay and the family is dependable on SSO Comcare financial assistance. The main caregiver is facing health issues and is unable to support the family's financial situation apart from the caregiving of the children. Having to struggle with basic needs, the family do not have additional finances to afford daily use electrical appliances.
Kindly look into this request, thank you so much.

name: Adult Bicycle
description: Client is a 62 male who is currently homeless and sleeping in the open. Client is seeking employment but worries about transport and hopes to have a working bicycle so he can cycle to work. Client is familiar with foldable bicycle or MTB.

name: Bicycle
description: The client is struggling with his mental health and finds it difficult to leave the house. However, he finds it less intimidating to leave his home on a bicycle. Riding the bicycle not only brings him from one point to another but it also helps him to better cope with his mental health. Donors please kindly contact his social worker Reuben at reubenyue@carecorner.org.sg or contact him at 6365 8751 if you wish to donate.

description: Single elderly woman who lives in a rental flat. She has poor eyesight and requires a new pair of spectacles as her current spectacle is broken. She faces financial strain. Please contact me at 9654 6514. Thank you.

name: Digital Camera
description: We are planning to conduct second run of photography group work. This run we are targetting at socially isolated and male seniors. We hope to tap on modality of photography as a platform to encourage participants to step out of their home, alleviate their anxieties and improve their quality of life. We would require 8 to 10 digital cameras (with charger)in mint condition. Please contact me at 96546514. Thank you.

name: wardrobe
description:
Client (28/M) resided with his wife (34/F) and 2 sons (3/M and 3/M). Client is currently employed as a food delivery man and wife employed as a part-time clinic assistant. Family is also supported by SSO@Woodlands for ComCare Assistance but still struggles to cope due to monthly repayment of debs previously incurred. Client wishes to support the family in greater capacity but identifies limitations in doing so currently due to his mental health concerns. Client is unable to acquire support from her family of origin due to history of strained relationships. Client shared on family's attempt in coping with difficulties encountered but faces financial difficulties, with recent ants infestation discovered in the family's shared wardrobe.
 
We would like to seek donations for a wooden wardrobe for family's usage in storing of their clothes due to family's financial struggeles. Your kindness is much appreciated.

name: 24 bottles X 361g Smucker's sugar free jam (assorted flavor)
description: We are requesting for 24 bottles of 361g Smucker's sugar free jam (assorted flavor) for the consumption for our residents from Monday to Saturday. The Helping Hand is a Voluntary Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. We have a total of about 100 residents and staff staying in at our premises.
